1. "Even a clay pot will break if it is struck often." This proverb is used to caution against repeated actions that might have negative consequences.
2. "The monkey is handsome in the mountain, but ugly in the city." This proverb is used to describe someone who is out of their element or looks out of place in a different environment.
3. "A tiger does not reveal its claws." This proverb is used to describe someone who is hiding their true intentions or abilities. It can also be used to caution against underestimating someone based on their appearance or demeanor.
